TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_tusa_a_bataan_nu_amilika_a_kalisiw, title = tusa_a_bataan_nu_amilika_a_kalisiw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/tusa_a_bataan_nu_amilika_a_kalisiw} }

S.FORM: tusa a bataan nu amilika a kalisiw20 美元的價值 amana kabalucu' tu nacilaay, mapecia ku sepi biyalaw satu ! kinacacay a milubang sa, idaw kida matinengay musakamu sakamusa ku sayaway nida, mudikec tu cacay tusabataan a kalisiw. 200 ?" Palima nami. Kilusatu kukamu " maydih kaku pabeli tina tusaay a bataan nu kalisiw tina kaputan, nika nuayawan nuyni, pihangi kaku tinakawaw. ."sakamusa…mahini lutlut han nida sakamusa " cima kumaydihay" idaw ku palimaay. 他說著... .sakamuwaca cinida " anu hini naku ku kawaw mahica hani ?"bakah han nida kidakalisiw I lala, epingan nu kuku', eping hanida. 他又說:"那麼, . namahida sapudan naca nida kida kalisiw, yakalisiw tanuuning malutlut . . "ayda cima kumaydihay?"idaw henay ku palimaay" . "cabay ,amuhatu namu mibingkiw kamu tu kapahay a cuda." . anu hicahicaen naku kidakalisiw, maydih henay kamu, nika caay kaselep kida kalisiw mahida tu tusabataan a kalisiw. 20 美元. dadan nu maudipay, ita mappulu nu cacanan a patucek a cayay kaw kapahay a matauwak, hicahicaen misawacu mabuliyas tu ku ukaukakan . . mahiniay tadanayi tu ku niwci. nika anumahicahica, atu anu sikawaw tu canan nuayawan nu paudipay amana kabiyalaw tu saala. .uadih nida, uuning tu tamelac, udiku masinanut, amuhantu u cayay kasausi nu kalisiw. ."pakatinengen ku wawa請讓你的孩子知道: nikaudip a heci amana kasingalih tu cacanan, amana kasingalih tu cabay, witatu ku mitucekay tu udip numita, u misitekeday kita amana katawal.

tosa a bataan no amilika a kalisiw20 美元的價值 amana kabaloco' to nacilaay, mapecia ko sepi biyalaw sato ! kinacacay a milobang sa, idaw kida matinengay mosakamo sakamosa ko sayaway nida, modikec to cacay tosabataan a kalisiw. 200 ?" Palima nami. Kilosato kokamo " maydih kako pabeli tina tosaay a bataan no kalisiw tina kapotan, nika noayawan noyni, pihangi kako tinakawaw. ."sakamosa…mahini lotlot han nida sakamosa " cima komaydihay" idaw ko palimaay. 他說著... .sakamowaca cinida " ano hini nako ko kawaw mahica hani ?"bakah han nida kidakalisiw I lala, epingan no koko', eping hanida. 他又說:"那麼, . namahida sapodan naca nida kida kalisiw, yakalisiw tanooning malotlot . . "ayda cima komaydihay?"idaw henay ko palimaay" . "cabay ,amohato namo mibingkiw kamo to kapahay a coda." . ano hicahicaen nako kidakalisiw, maydih henay kamo, nika caay kaselep kida kalisiw mahida to tosabataan a kalisiw. 20 美元. dadan no maodipay, ita mappolo no cacanan a patocek a cayay kaw kapahay a mataowak, hicahicaen misawaco maboliyas to ko okaokakan . . mahiniay tadanayi to ko niwci. nika anomahicahica, ato ano sikawaw to canan noayawan no paodipay amana kabiyalaw to saala. .oadih nida, ooning to tamelac, odiko masinanot, amohanto o cayay kasaosi no kalisiw. ."pakatinengen ko wawa請讓你的孩子知道: nikaodip a heci amana kasingalih to cacanan, amana kasingalih to cabay, witato ko mitocekay to odip nomita, o misitekeday kita amana katawal.
